summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 3019 lux), and cloud levels (up 443 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1377 m), light levels (up 5370 lux), feels like temperature (up 2.6°C), and outside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 443.0m lower than yesterday, 977.8m lower than past week, 1376.9m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1430.4m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2410m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable. Drizzle or light rain possible, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
